nodes.name: withdraw

params._amount: MOST token deposit amount in atto.
params._beneficiary: Address of beneficiary on target metachain.
params._blockNumber: Block number of origin chain against which storage proof is generated.
params._depositor: Address of depositor on the origin chain.
params._feeGasLimit: Gas limit at which fee will be capped.
params._feeGasPrice: Gas price at which fee will be calculated.
params._rlpParentNodes: Storage merkle proof to verify message declaration                       on the origin chain.

confirmOpenKernel(uint256,bytes32,uint25.details: Function requires:         - Sender address must not be 0.         - Kernel hash must not be 0.         - Difference between kernelheight and current metablock height           must be 1.

params._blockNumber: Block number at which proof is valid.
params._feeGasLimit: Gas limit which the sender is willing to pay.
params._feeGasPrice: Gas price which the sender is willing to pay.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded parent node data to prove message                       exists in outbox of ConsensusGateway.

getRemoteGatewayLatestProvenBlockNumber(.return: blockNumber_ Remote gateway latest proven block number.

params._kernelHash: Hash of kernel at given height.

params._blockNumber: Block number at which consensus gateway is to be proven.
params._rlpParentNodes: RLP encoded value of account proof node array.

params._consensusGateway: Address of consensus cogateway contract at auxiliary chain.
params._maxStorageRootItems: Max storage roots to be stored.
params._utBase: Address of UtBase contract at auxiliary chain.

withdraw(uint256,address,uint256,uint256.details: Function requires :         - Amount must not be 0.         - Beneficiary must not be 0.         - Withdrawal amount must be greater than multiplication of           gas price and gas limit.

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be redeemed.
params._beneficiary: The address in the origin chain where the value                    where the tokens will be withdrawn.
params._feeGasLimit: Gas limit at which fee will be capped.
params._feeGasPrice: Gas price at which fee will be calculated.

confirmDeposit(uint256,address,uint256,u.notice: Confirm deposit in order to mint tokens.

confirmOpenKernel(uint256,bytes32,uint25.notice: Confirms the initiation of opening a kernel at auxiliary chain.

getRemoteGatewayLatestProvenBlockNumber(.notice: Gets the remote gateway latest proven block number.

hashChannelIdentifier(bytes32,address,ad.notice: Generate channel identifier hash from the input params

hashDepositIntent(address,uint256,addres.notice: It returns hash of deposit intent.

hashWithdrawIntent(address,address,uint2.notice: It returns hash of withdraw intent.

inboxMessageHash(bytes32,uint256,uint256.notice: Generate inbox message hash from the input params

outboxMessageHash(bytes32,uint256,uint25.notice: Generate outbox message hash from the input params

proveConsensusGateway(uint256,bytes,byte.notice: This method will be called by anyone to verify merkle proof of         consensus gateway contract address.

setup(bytes32,address,address,address,ui.notice: It sets up consensus cogateway. It can only be called once.

withdraw(uint256,address,uint256,uint256.notice: It allows withdrawing UtBase tokens. Withdrawer needs to        approve consensus cogateway contract for the amount to        be withdrawn.
